LABELS.FORGOT_PAGE_MSG: To receive your username and password, please enter the email address you have registered with WK Quizzing Platform. We will email you a link to a page where you can create a new password. If you do not receive an email, please check your spam mail folder or contact Customer Support.
LABELS.FORGOT_RESET_MSG: Password reset link has been sent to your email address successfully.
LABELS.FORGOT_USERNAME_MSG: Username has been sent to your email address successfully.

ERRORS.PASSWORD_VAL_MSG: Password should be minimum 8  maximum 50  characters and include at least 1 number, 1 special char and 1 Caps letter.
ERRORS.PASSWORD_NOT_MATCH: Password and Confirm Password do not match
ERRORS.FIRSTNAME_VAL_MSG: First name should be minimum 1 maximum 50 characters
ERRORS.INITIAL_VAL_MSG: Middle Initial should be maximum 50 characters
ERRORS.LASTNAME_VAL_MSG: Last name should be minimum 1 maximum 50 characters
ERRORS.ADDRESS_VAL_MSG: Address should be  minimum 3 maximum 255 characters
ERRORS.ADDRESS_PATTERN: Address should have only alphanumeric characters
ERRORS.POSTAL_VAL_MSG: Postal Code should be  minimum 3 maximum 25 characters
ERRORS.POSTAL_PATTERN: Postal Code should  have only alphanumeric characters
ERRORS.CITY_VAL_MSG: City should be minimum 3 maximum 50 characters
ERRORS.CONTACT_TOOLTIP: Contact Number should accept only numbers ,+,-,(,)
ERRORS.PHONE_VAL_MSG: Phone Number should be maximum 25 characters

ALERTS.INVALID_RESETLINK: Reset Link is expired or invalid
